name: Bluetooth Toaster
description: A toaster that connects to your phone to send you notifications when your toast is ready.

name: WiFi-Enabled Umbrella
description: An umbrella that tracks weather updates and glows when rain is detected nearby.

name: Smart Fork
description: A fork that vibrates if you eat too quickly, syncing data to your health app.

name: USB-Powered Mug Warmer
description: A mug warmer that keeps your drink hot, powered by your computer's USB port.

name: App-Controlled Candle
description: A candle you can turn on and off with your smartphone.

name: Selfie-Snapping Mirror
description: A bathroom mirror that automatically takes selfies and uploads them to social media.

description: A plant pot that tweets when your plant needs water.

name: Voice-Activated Trash Can
description: A trash can that opens when you tell it to.

description: A fridge magnet that displays your calendar and weather updates.

name: LED Shoelaces
description: Shoelaces that light up and can be controlled via an app.
